step1.sentence: Travel is one of the most effective ways to expand your knowledge of the world.

step2.story: The reading group had been meeting monthly for eleven years. The original purpose had been to expand their literary knowledge. Over time it had expanded far more: their understanding of each other, of history, of how to disagree generously.

step3.story: The hospital had introduced a cross-departmental rotation program for junior doctors specifically to expand their clinical knowledge beyond their specialty. The cardiology resident who spent a month in oncology came back with a different understanding of patient communication under uncertainty. The geriatrics resident who rotated through the ED came back with a different relationship to speed and decision-making. The knowledge they expanded was not only medical.
